transArray.content: Everything else is good but the room is a bit small

Hello dear guest! First of all, thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your recognition of the service. Your satisfaction is our unchanging pursuit. Due to the renovation time, there is indeed a certain gap between the hotel room area and the newly opened store, but although the majong is small However, the facilities in the room are complete, and the hotel rooms and public area supporting facilities can meet your daily living needs. We will continue to work hard and use our careful work to exchange for your peace of mind and comfort when you check in. All the hotel staff look forward to your every visit, and wish you a good holiday joy! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
